title: About Us
content:
# About Our Research Team

We are a multidisciplinary research group focused on developing innovative solutions at the intersection of artificial intelligence, energy systems, and infrastructure resilience.

## Our Mission

To advance knowledge and create practical tools that help communities build sustainable and resilient infrastructure systems.

## Research Areas

- Decision Intelligence and AI
- Energy Systems Optimization
- Infrastructure Resilience
- Sustainable Technology
mission: To advance knowledge and create practical tools that help communities build sustainable and resilient infrastructure systems.
vision: A future where intelligent systems enable sustainable and resilient communities worldwide.
